165_P_H_CP_114.name: Heater Status Request
165_P_H_CP_114.desc: OCP requests status from an addressable heater (addresses 112-127). Heater responds with Action 115.

165_P_CP_H_115.name: Heater Status Response
165_P_CP_H_115.desc: Addressable heater (addresses 112-127) responds with status to OCP after Action 114 request.
